attributes.action: people that voted in the referendum to vote on wto or mrs mays deal
attributes.additional_details:
mps not representing the referendum result out is out anything else is surely a fails to uphold the referendum result won by 17.4 million
clearly the mps can agree that there is no agreement on how to leave should a third meaningful vote fail the decision should be given back to those that were eligable and voted
 to vote on one question with 2 options  1 leave W.T.O 2 Accept mrs mays agreement this must be open to only those who voted at the referendom after all they made the result both leave and remain
attributes.background: parliment cant agree  send it back to only those who voted in the referendum 2 questions only clear decide ... 1 leave W.T.O 2 leave with pms deal
